remarks: The composition of two linear operators is linear.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Nov-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnocoi.l $e |- L = ( U LnOp W ) $.
lnocoi.m $e |- M = ( W LnOp X ) $.
lnocoi.n $e |- N = ( U LnOp X ) $.
lnocoi.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
lnocoi.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
lnocoi.x $e |- X e. NrmCVec $.
lnocoi.s $e |- S e. L $.
lnocoi.t $e |- T e. M $.
lnocoi $p |- ( T o. S ) e. N $.
